name: Famous People Called William Online Trivia | Name Game | 25 Questions

questions.text: Name the famous English playwright born in Stratford-upon-Avon. William ... ?
questions.explanation:
Shakespeare.

	If you got that one wrong things are going from bard to verse.

questions.text: Name the 25th American President who died after being shot by an anarchist whilst opening an exhibition in Buffalo, New York in 1901. William ... ?

questions.explanation:
Smith & smith.

	More commonly known as W.H. Smith.

questions.text: He formed the Battle Creek Toasted Cornflake Company to make a breakfast cereal he had co-invented with his brother, John, a keen vegetarian. What was this William's family name?

questions.explanation:
Pitt.

	William Pitt the Younger.Some people thought the act of introducing income tax was the pitts.
